title: My Friend Gabby
author: justagirl
citation: justagirl. "My Friend Gabby: experience with Gabapentin (ID 93425)". Erowid.org. Nov 4, 2011. erowid.org/exp/93425
footer:
[ View as PDF (for printing) ] [ View as LaTeX (for geeks) ]
[ Switch Colors ]
report:
I take 2 600mg of the white oval kinda chalky pills at a time. I have anxiety problems and Gabby helps me to chill the f out.
Pros: helps me chill out, more social
Cons: shakiness, weird thoughts like worrying I'll get addicted to the shit
I have a 2 year old girl and I play with her and take care of her just as well on it as I do off of it, but it's not something I would or do take every day, just when I feel I need to chill out.
